title: Doesn't anyone think vladimir is weak?
body:
You can farm the whole game and be up two levels and still be useless as vladmir

His damage is just so weak

replies.body: I wouldn't say his damage is weak. It is actually pretty fine especially if you farm up. The problem is usually Vlad's team reliance.

Yes he is weak. Vlad was nerfed because his kit is amazing in a coordinated team comp. If {{item:3123}} was not an item he would have a better time as well I am guessing. I find his problem now is that you have to build him more glass cannon for doing damage, and due to the fact you have to be in the danger zone to do damage really hurts him.

His.. damage is... weak?

What are you building?

He does way too much damage for a champion that is borderline unkillable if he gets slightly ahead, and his laning damage is very high for a manaless ranged champion with insane sustain. He just suffers from being a bit binary.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/hElJG2qq-that-feel-when-you-singlehandedly-win-the-4v5-by-yourself

Maybe you just need to get good.
I agree. Unless you build him full AP, and I mean complete glass canon, his damage is weak compared to old vlad. Makes me nostalgic.
wrong category, should be moved to memes and games
